alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 10:00PM CDT until March 31 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LAWRENCE AND SOUTHEASTERN CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 1000 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Palestine to Chauncey, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Vincennes, Lawrenceville, Palestine, Flat Rock, Russellville, New Hebron, Chauncey, Birds, Hardinville, Merom, Pinkstaff, Petrolia, Crawford County Airport and Lawrenceville Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern and east central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
